entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as no longer being Bellatrix, but instead standing in overlarge robes and completely herself.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as red-haired and beardless again.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is described as clambering to his feet and looking back at the deluge.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as realizing that the Thief's Downfall has washed away all enchantment and magical concealment.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as checking that she still had the beaded bag.

entities.name: bogrod
entities.description: Bogrod is described as shaking his head in bewilderment and having an Imperius Curse lifted by the Thief's Downfall.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is described as a location where the Thief's Downfall has washed away all enchantment and magical concealment.

relationships.description: Griphook mentions that Gringotts has set off defenses against them.
Harry checks to make sure he still has the Invisibility Cloak.
Hermione checks that she still has the beaded bag.
Griphook says they need Bogrod to enter the vault.
